channel.title: Community Events & Activities
channel.description:
Visitors to the historic district are encouraged bike, walk or take the Metrorail Yellow or Blue lines to the King Street Station and take the free King Street Trolley, or DASH or Metro buses to the festival. For DASH schedule information, call 703.370.DASH or visit dashbus.com. For Metrobus schedule information, call 202.637.7000 or visit wmata.com. Parking is also available in one of the convenient parking garages or lots.

Bicyclists may visit alexandriava.gov/localmotion for the City's Bikeways Map, which features the City's best on-street and off-road bikeways, as well as locations of grouped bicycle parking.

For additional information, call the sponsoring organization for more information.  For events sponsored by the City of Alexandria, call the Special Events Hotline at 703.746.5592 for current information. Please be advised, events are subject to change.

  • Parking in Old Town 
  • Arts in Alexandria 
  • City Concerts 
  • Permit to hold Special Events in the City

Also see our website for more information, including schedules for RPCA-sponsored classes and activities.

item.title: Nowruz Festival - Sun Mar 15, 2015 11:00 AM - 5:00 PM
item.description:
This Persian festival features performances by singers & dancers; food and art work sales and the opportunity to share in the culture.

Location: John Carlyle Park, 300 John Carlyle St. (Map: http://apps.alexandriava.gov/MapThis/?a=11892816.2556964,6978951.57290552)

Contact Phone: 202.369.1515
Contact Email: shohreh@nowruzfestival.org
Audience: Anyone may attend
Tags: Carlyle Eisenhower East, Community Event, Family, Food, Performing Arts, Recreation, Restricted Food Trucks, Visual Arts, Volunteer

item.title: Underwater Egg Hunt - Sat Apr 4, 2015 1:00 PM - 4:00 PM
item.description:
Jump in and explore the water to find as many eggs as possible. Some special eggs will have prizes! Also participate in fun games, climb on the Aqua Challenge inflatable, and enjoy a special visit from Alex the Bunny! Bring your own waterproof basket. Chaperones free.

To participate in the Egg Hunt, ages 6 months - 5 years should register for a 2:30 p.m. or 3:15 p.m. time slot and ages 6-13 years should register for a 1 p.m. or 1:45 p.m. time slot. Register using activity #484200.

Location: Chinquapin Park Recreation Center, 3210 King St. (Map: http://apps.alexandriava.gov/MapThis/?a=11886499.932405,6986221.90135296)
Website: http://www.alexandriava.gov/webtrac
Contact Person: Lindsay Burneson
Contact Phone: 703.746.5553
Contact Email: lindsay.burneson@alexandriava.gov
Fees: $5 each.
Audience: Anyone may attend
Tags: Aquatics, Community Event, Family, Pools, Recreation, Recreation Centers

item.title: Windmill Hill Park Shoreline Community Meeting - Mon Apr 13, 2015 6:30 PM - 8:30 PM
item.description:
The City of Alexandria will host a public information meeting to review conceptual design options for the bulkhead replacement and shoreline improvements at Windmill Hill Park, 501 S. Union Street.

Location: Lee Center, 1108 Jefferson St. (Map: http://apps.alexandriava.gov/MapThis/?a=11895120.1844377,6976733.86514184)
Website: http://www.alexandriava.gov/recreation/info/default.aspx?id=12292#Windmill_Hill
Contact Person: Anthony Gammon
Contact Phone: 703.746.4155
Contact Email: anthony.gammon@alexandriava.gov
Audience: Anyone may attend
Tags: Commission Meeting, Environment, Old & Historic Alexandria, Old Town, Open Space, Parks, Recreation, Water, Waterfront

item.title: Family Fun Night - Fri Apr 24, 2015 6:00 PM - 9:00 PM
item.description:
Bring the whole family to Family Fun Nights for swimming and fun for all ages on Friday evenings. Pool games include beach ball relays, water basketball, diving for prizes and fun on the ‘Aqua Challenge’ floating obstacle course. Participate in swimming skill assessments for youth, learn pool safety tips and more.

Location: Chinquapin Park Recreation Center, 3210 King St. (Map: http://apps.alexandriava.gov/MapThis/?a=11886499.932405,6986221.90135296)
Contact Person: Ralph Baird
Contact Phone: 703.746.5435
Contact Email: ralph.baird@alexandriava.gov
Fees: $4 per person. Passes not accepted.
Audience: Anyone may attend
Tags: Aquatics, Family, Pools, Recreation, Recreation Centers, Youth

item.title: Alexandria Earth Day - Sat Apr 25, 2015 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM
item.description:
Program includes children's activities; exhibits by community groups; food sales; tree sales; recycling; Arbor Day tree planting; and a musical performance.

Location: Ben Brenman Park, 4800 Brenman Park Dr. (Map: http://apps.alexandriava.gov/MapThis/?a=11877271.3182385,6980101.0725246)
Contact Phone: 703.746.5418
Audience: Anyone may attend
Tags: Eco-City, Environment, Family, Food, Parks, Recreation, Schools, Visual Arts, West End

item.title: Spring for Alexandria - Fri May 15, 2015 12:30 PM - 4:00 PM
item.description:
Hundreds of volunteers will perform community service at nonprofit and city agencies throughout the city. Fifty volunteers will build and paint book shelves on the stage under the supervision of carpenters.

Location: City Hall
Contact Person: Marion Brunken
Contact Phone: 703.836.2176
Contact Email: mbrunken@volunteeralexandria.org
Audience: Anyone may attend
Tags: Recreation, Volunteer

item.description:

item.title: Beat the Heat Racquetball Tournament - Sat Jun 20, 2015 9:00 AM - Sun Jun 21, 2015 6:00 PM
item.description:
Ages 18 & up. Join in the fun with this double elimination tournament for singles and doubles, divided by age groups: Men and/or Women 18–34, 35–50, 51–65 and 66 & over. Tournament will be played Saturday and/or Sunday. To participate, register for activity #423210.

Location: Chinquapin Park Recreation Center, 3210 King St. (Map: http://apps.alexandriava.gov/MapThis/?a=11886499.932405,6986221.90135296)
Website: http://www.alexandriava.gov/webtrac
Contact Person: Tamika Coleman
Contact Phone: 703.746.5408
Contact Email: tamika.coleman@alexandriava.gov
Fees: $35 per player
Audience: Anyone may attend
Tags: Adult, Community Event, Exercise, Recreation, Recreation Centers, Sports
